ThingDef.label: tattoo pigment (pollen)
ThingDef.description: A special pigment made from psychoid leaves, imbued with mechanites long since dormant in the soil. A strong beautiful yellow, reminiscent of flowers.

ThingDef.label: tattoo pigment (forest)
ThingDef.description: A special pigment made from healroot, imbued with mechanites long since dormant in the soil. A deep and alluring green, like a secluded wood.

ThingDef.label: tattoo pigment (blood)
ThingDef.description: A special pigment made from devilstrand mushrooms, imbued with mechanites long since dormant in the soil. As vivid and bright as freshly spilt blood.

ThingDef.label: tattoo pigment (sky)
ThingDef.description: A special pigment made from smokeleaf plants, imbued with mechanites long since dormant in the soil. A calming blue, like a summer sky.

ThingDef.label: tattoo pigment (sea)
ThingDef.description: A complex colour blended from forest and sky pigments, imbued with mechanites long since dormant in the soil. Impressive like a stormy sea.

ThingDef.label: tattoo pigment (grass)
ThingDef.description: A complex colour blended from pollen and forest pigments, imbued with mechanites long since dormant in the soil. A vibrant green not unlike a meadow.

ThingDef.label: tattoo pigment (flame)
ThingDef.description: A complex colour blended from blood and pollen pigments, imbued with mechanites long since dormant in the soil. Deep and powerful, like the sun.

ThingDef.label: tattoo pigment (royal)
ThingDef.description: A complex colour blended from sky and blood pigments, imbued with mechanites long since dormant in the soil. An extremely impressive and regal purple.
